name: Ruby Red Lipstick
description: Long-lasting matte finish lipstick with rich pigmentation. Perfect for all-day wear.

name: Rose Petal Blush
description: Silky smooth blush that gives you a natural rosy glow. Buildable formula.

name: Midnight Black Eyeliner
description: Waterproof gel eyeliner with precision applicator. Smudge-proof formula.

name: Hydrating Face Cream
description: 24-hour moisturizing cream with hyaluronic acid. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Nude Matte Lipstick
description: Everyday nude shade with comfortable matte finish. Non-drying formula.

name: Shimmer Eyeshadow Palette
description: 12-color palette with metallic and matte shades. Highly pigmented.

name: Volumizing Mascara
description: Lengthening and volumizing mascara. Clump-free application.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: Brightening serum with 20% Vitamin C. Reduces dark spots and fine lines.

name: Coral Blush
description: Warm coral shade for a sun-kissed look. Blends seamlessly.

name: HD Foundation
description: Full coverage foundation with natural finish. Available in 15 shades.

name: Berry Lip Gloss
description: High-shine lip gloss with non-sticky formula. Moisturizing berry tint.

name: Gentle Cleanser
description: pH-balanced facial cleanser. Removes makeup without stripping skin.

name: Brow Pencil
description: Precision eyebrow pencil with spoolie brush. Long-lasting formula.

name: Makeup Fixer
description: Long-lasting makeup fixer. Keeps makeup fresh for 16+ hours.

name: Night Repair Cream
description: Anti-aging night cream with retinol. Reduces wrinkles overnight.

name: Highlighter
description: Highlighter palette with champagne glow. Easy to blend.

name: Liquid Eyeliner Pen
description: Ultra-fine tip liquid liner. Perfect for precise winged looks.

name: Plum Lipstick
description: Deep plum shade with satin finish. Perfect for evening wear.

name: Makeup Remover
description: Gentle bi-phase makeup remover. Removes waterproof makeup easily.

name: Contour Palette
description: 3-shade contour kit with highlighter. Sculpts and defines features.

name: Flawless Foundation
description: Up to 24 hour wear matte foundation with SPF 20 to radiate flawless beauty.
